    • Constructor Detail

      • SlopeOneModelDataAccumulator

        public SlopeOneModelDataAccumulator(double damping,
                            ItemDAO dao)
        Creates an accumulator to process rating data and generate the necessary data for a SlopeOneItemScorer.
        Parameters:
        damping - A damping term for deviation calculations.
        dao - The DataAccessObject interfacing with the data for the model

    • Method Detail

               SparseVector itemVec1,

        Puts the item pair into the accumulator.
        Parameters:
        id1 - The id of the first item.
        itemVec1 - The rating vector of the first item.
        id2 - The id of the second item.
        itemVec2 - The rating vector of the second item.

      • buildMatrix

        public Long2ObjectMap<ImmutableSparseVector> buildMatrix()
        Returns:
        A matrix of item deviation and corating values to be used by a SlopeOneItemScorer.
